attributes.action: Give more powers to the RSPCA as animal welfare officers have in the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Officers need to have the the immediate power to remove animals that are in distress and must be allowed to enter premises at the time of discovery and have powers of arrrest. They must also have the power to seize dogs they consider to be dangerous ie pit-bull types.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give more powers to the RSPCA as animal welfare officers have in the USA."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12834.asp

Prime Minister's Office
